title: Hogwarts Legacy
text: George Osric: Ages since I've been to the castle. *Owl screech* Would be good to see the old pile of rocks.
*right before George gets into the carriage he looks around and gets a concerned look*
*carriage door closes and what seems as a carriage with no horses starts to move and flies off toward Hogwarts*
*as the carriage leaves, a shady character stares as it goes and Apparates into thin air*
